short_description.value: Adoptech is an intelligent software platform to connect, manage and automate all your security compliance processes, certifications, audits and tests across multiple security frameworks.

long_description.value: Adoptech helps automate compliance, audits and certifications across multiple frameworks simultaneously. We support the following frameworks. With Adoptech, you can connect, manage, and automate your company security compliance, certification and risk management tasks. Working across multiple frameworks such as Data Privacy, Cyber Essentials, ISO 27001, SOC 2 and DORA. Adoptech is an intelligent software platform to connect, manage and automate all your security compliance processes, certifications, audits and tests across multiple security frameworks. The platform integrates with multiple applications and services, including cloud providers, identity providers, task management, custom security apps, and many more. Adoptech also provides a document generator to create, personalize, share and e-sign company policies and agreements, saving businesses thousands of pounds on legal fees.
